text: UNIFORM DISCRETE RANDOM VARIABLES 2 Uniform discrete random variables. 34 A probability distribution of a random variable can be expressed as a probability distribution function 𝑃 𝑥 = 𝑃 𝑋 = 𝑥 . The domain is the set of possible values of the variable. The range is the set of values in probability distribution. 56789 EXERCISE 2.04 (PAGE 66) • Question 5 • Question 7
